heroIntro: Real-world engagements in critical system performance, stabilisation, modernisation, and enablement
heroBody: Explore full project stories, including constraints, technical decisions, and outcomes. Start with the cards below and open any study for complete context.

cards.title: Database Discipline Under Sales Pressure
cards.problem: Mission-critical reports took four hours, crashed, and locked HQ systems.
cards.intervention: Query-plan forensics, indexing, view abstraction, and lock-safe reporting redesign.
cards.outcome: Runtime dropped from 4 hours to 30 minutes, with system locks removed.

cards.title: Zero-Failure Inventory
cards.problem: Legacy inventory software instability created tax and insurance compliance risk.
cards.intervention: Re-platformed to C# and SQL, local-first architecture, and high-touch rollout support.

cards.title: Hardening POS Infrastructure
cards.problem: Dust-driven POS failures disrupted transactions and inventory sync.
cards.intervention: Ventilated enclosure redesign, hardened hardware builds, and maintenance protocol.
cards.outcome: Failure rate dropped to 1-2 incidents per quarter across the estate.

cards.title: Monitoring Layer for Distributed Data Reliability
cards.problem: Overnight store data transfers failed silently and planning teams discovered issues too late.
cards.intervention: VPN rollout support, heartbeat monitoring, dashboard visibility, and fallback retrieval paths.
cards.outcome: Real-time issue visibility replaced next-morning failure discovery.

cards.title: Cross-Platform Rebuild for Measurement Software
cards.context: Helios RF Systems - RF analyzer manufacturer
cards.problem: A legacy Windows codebase was unstable, slow to evolve, and hurting market perception.
cards.intervention: Qt and C++ re-architecture, modular migration, communication layer abstraction, and team enablement.
cards.outcome: Stable cross-platform product restored software as a market differentiator.

cards.title: From Research Scripts to Deployable Agency Software
cards.problem: Mathematically strong research scripts were not deployable or maintainable for real users.
cards.intervention: Full desktop rebuild with structured interfaces, visualization stack, and maintainable workflow.
cards.outcome: Delivered a production-grade demonstrator with handover-ready codebase.

cards.title: When the Webshop Was Ready-But the Back-End Wasn't
cards.context: Skyline Access - aerial platform rental network
cards.problem: A launch-ready webshop had no integration path to the live rental system.
cards.intervention: DMZ architecture, CSP Gateway, and a REST API to expose complex availability logic.
cards.outcome: Webshop launched on schedule after three months of integration work.

cards.title: When Offline Isn't Optional
cards.context: Rhine Equipment Services - construction equipment dealer and service provider
cards.problem: A hybrid Node.js/C# field app crashed, desynced, and failed in offline conditions.
cards.intervention: Rebuilt to C# WinForms with typed datasets, offline-first sync, and recovery safeguards.
cards.outcome: True offline work restored and user acceptance improved across the fleet.

cards.title: From Chaos to Control
cards.context: Ironbridge ERP - ERP vendor for equipment trade and rental
cards.problem: A 30-year ERP ran without version control or isolated development environments.
cards.intervention: Git adoption, branch separation, local environments, and automated installers.
cards.outcome: Service resolution time dropped from days to hours with stable deployments.

cards.title: When Real-Time Became Possible Again
cards.context: Ironbridge ERP - ERP vendor for equipment trade and rental
cards.problem: Nightly BI batch processing failed for large customers and broke trust in reporting.
cards.intervention: Replaced ETL with indexed SQL Views, runtime calculations, and side-by-side validation.
cards.outcome: Real-time reporting returned without disrupting daily ERP operations.

cards.title: Digitalising Goods Receipt on Legacy Hardware
cards.context: Atlas Heavy Industries - regional operation in a global equipment group
cards.problem: Goods receipts were paper-based and the existing ERP lacked a mobile interface.
cards.intervention: Built a Windows CE client and SOAP bridge with vendor-aligned interface design.
cards.outcome: Process became fully digital and ran for five years without software tickets.

cards.title: From Black Box to Operating System (Jira Cloud)
cards.problem: Work management was opaque, interrupt-driven, and fragmented across teams.
cards.intervention: Rolled out Jira Cloud with governance, routing rules, and pilot-led adoption.
cards.outcome: Company-wide rollout retired the legacy system and improved delivery clarity.
